entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to definition is not consistent with C# compilation when a symbol is missing #74443
  • EnC: Emit System.Runtime.CompilerServices.HotReloadException #74442
  • See squigglies in #if'd code but Quick Actions don't work. #74438
    Backlog
  • TestCode classification breaks in LSP for lines that begin with whitespace #74435
  • Enabling latest-All analyzers hangs build #74434

Closed

  • Method name style is not consistent along the code #74439
  • "Unresolvable conflict" when renaming a C# 9 record property #50450
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
  • Add more descriptive error message when editorconfig value is incorrect #74449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup in VS generator UI code. #74448
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add monthly smoke test to release branch official builds #74447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge internal release/dev17.11 back to release/dev17.11 #74446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not load generators in VS process #74444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Document state updating #74441
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Instance extensions - flesh out code gen for iterator/async methods. #74437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support VS System theme #74432
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AnalyzerFileReference.GetAnalyzerTypeNameMap #74411
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid shipping dependency on EA.RazorCompiler to SDK #74436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74413
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ifdefs related to formatting #74424
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip TestCode classification type when computing tokens. #74433
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fill some gaps in Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #74389
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Adjust overload resolution priority from LDM #74428
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic for 'value' as a contextual keyword #74408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
